bp_text.value: Welcome to the Treasure Valley! Home of Pendeedus. A pristine landscape that incorporates the best rural Idaho with the greatest of cities. From our office, you're minutes away from horsebacking the Idaho wilderness or minutes away from fine dining in downtown Boise. Like Pendeedus, it has the best of what hasn't changed in 100s of years with the latest of day to day advancements.
